lead_paragraph: DEAR Mr. EDITOR :-I am a young man, "well enough to do in the world," but, just now, somewhat straitened. I am practising economy, which habit has already made pleasant, and with the aid of a snug wife expect to honor the oracles which say, that a little while hence we shall enjoy a competence. But my wife sometimes fears that I do not dress enough to be quite respectable.
